task.title: Add Character to Favorites
task.shortdesc: Add and remove characters from Favorites in the IPA Map.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on any character in the IPA Map and select Add to favorites from the context menu.
step.stepresult: The selected character will appear at the top of the IPA Map window in the Favorites section. The character will remain in this section until it you remove it.

step.cmd: To remove a character from the Favorites section, right-click (CTRL+click) on it either in the Favorites section or in its original section, and select Remove from favourites from the context menu.
